price: Na mcheni Mwenyezi Mungu, wala msinihizi.
footnotes: Na mwogopeni Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu! Msifanye uchafu wenu, mkanipatisha hizaya na madhila mbele yao!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
